text: Bulbinella nutans is a species of plants in the family Asphodelaceae. It is found in the Cape Province of South Africa.http://pza.sanbi.org/sites/default/files/info_library/bulbinella.pdf B.nutans is a large plant, reaching nearly a meter in height. It closely resembles Bulbine latifolia, but has a wider and shorter inflorescence. B.nutans naturally occurs in the southern Cape, from Cape Town eastwards to the Robertson Karoo, Caledon, and east of Swellendam. == References == Category:Asphodeloideae Category:Flora of South Africa nutans
title: Bulbinella nutans
